ACCEPTED_LEGAL_GOODS.message: Thank you. You know a good deal when you see one!

ACCEPTED_RESCUE.message: Thank you very much. The crew will appreciate that.

ADTEXT_ARMS_DEALER.message: Pick-up mission: prompt recovery of drifting container required.

ADTEXT_ILLEGAL_GOODS.message: Have a cargo scoop and looking for your next score? Valuable information for sale.

ADTEXT_LEGAL_GOODS.message: Derelict Brokerage Services: information regarding a debris field with valuable cargo.

ADTEXT_RESCUE.message: HELP NEEDED: Urgent escape capsule rescue operation.

DENY_1.message: Excuse me, sir? I don't think your current qualification is sufficient.

DENY_2.message: Sorry, I think this task is beyond your ability as a pilot.

DOCKING_INSTRUCTION.message: Nice to meet you. Please approach to within 100m to complete the cargo transfer!

FAILURE_MSG_ARMS_DEALER.message: You fool. The client's not gonna like this!

FAILURE_MSG_RESCUE.message: Your unreliability has caused great harm. Get out of my sight!

HOW_MUCH_TIME.message: How much time do I have?

HOW_MUCH_TIME_ARMS_DEALER.message: My business partner is in orbit around {star} to avoid detection. It would be great if you could reach him before {date}.

HOW_MUCH_TIME_ILLEGAL_GOODS.message: Don't waste time. Only the early bird catches the worm!

HOW_MUCH_TIME_LEGAL_GOODS.message: I don't know. But if I were you, I would be quick!

HOW_MUCH_TIME_RESCUE.message: It would be good if you could reach the location before {date}.

INTROTEXT_ARMS_DEALER.message: Hello Commander. My name is {client}. It would be great if you could help me out. An unreliable freighter captain dropped my cargo near {planet} and has disappeared since. Your task would be to pick up one container and deliver it to ship {shipid} in orbit around {star}. I would pay you {cash}.

INTROTEXT_ILLEGAL_GOODS.message: Hey buddy, I know about a debris field with illegal goods. The police caught a smuggler close to {planet}. They haven't had time to clean up the area yet. If you are quick, you can make easy money! I can give you the coordinates. It only costs you {cash}. Don't let the chance slip by!

INTROTEXT_LEGAL_GOODS.message: Hello my friend. I'm {client}. I heard about a cargo hauler that got into trouble near {planet} because of bad ship maintenance. Amazing who gets to fly a spaceship these days, isn't it? Anyway, they had to dump a lot of the cargo. If you're quick, you can grab the cargo very easily! This info is as good as new! I'll sell you the coordinates for lousy {cash}. What do you say?

INTROTEXT_RESCUE.message: Hi, my name is {client}. The crew of a freighter had to abandon their ship after an incident. The ship owner is willing to pay {cash} for a discreet rescue mission. The accident site is near {planet}. Please pick up the crew and bring them to a station!

REPEAT_THE_REQUEST.message: Could you please repeat the request?

SHIP_DESTROYED.message: Oh no. {shipid} has been destroyed. Deliver the cargo to {station} now!

SUCCESS_MSG_ARMS_DEALER.message: Hey Ace, nice flying! Money has been transferred.

SUCCESS_MSG_RESCUE.message: Thank you very much! The crew would also like to express their thanks.

WARNING.message: Hey! What are you trying to do? Our contract is at risk! Please pick that up again!

WHY_NOT_YOURSELF.message: Why don't you do it yourself?

WHY_NOT_YOURSELF_ARMS_DEALER.message: The local authorities are watching me! I have to keep a low profile for a few weeks.

WHY_NOT_YOURSELF_ILLEGAL_GOODS.message: I'm just an office clerk. I don't own a ship.

WHY_NOT_YOURSELF_RESCUE.message: I have no ship available at this time.

YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_A_SCOOP.message: Sorry, you do not have a cargo scoop.
